document.name: message
document.title: &dactyl.appName; Messages
document.p: &dactyl.appName; stores all info and error messages in a message history. The type of info messages output can be controlled by the verbose option. The maximum number of stored messages can be limited with the messages option.

description.p: Redisplay the last command output. Only the most recent command's output is available.

document.code: -- More -- -- More -- SPACE/d/j: screen/page/line down, b/u/k: up, q: quit
document.p: This message is displayed when the message window is filled with messages and the more option is set. It is styled with the MoreMsg :highlight group. When the more message is shown, the following key mappings are available:

dl.dd: down all the way, until the hit-enter prompt
stop the listing and enter a command line
yank (copy) a modeless selection to the clipboard
